name: AVAuthorizationStatus
desc: Constants that provide information regarding permission to use media capture devices.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: Explicit user permission is required for media capture, but the user has not yet granted or denied such permission.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: The user is not allowed to access media capture devices.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: The user has explicitly denied permission for media capture.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: The user has explicitly granted permission for media capture, or explicit user permission is not necessary for the media type in question.
